Date   : 17/05/05
-----------------
Package upgraded to version : Unified-6.0
Console Debugger can now be used on both electrical
and optical FECs - See Device Driver version Unified-6.0
Readme.txt file for details.

Package: console debugger 
Date   : 12/06/03
